 Talk How to Add a Website to Trusted Sites   
 This wikiHow teaches you how to add the URL of a website you trust to your browser's "Trusted Sites" list. Websites on the "Trusted Sites" list won't have cookies, notifications, or pop-ups blocked by your browser's security settings. Unfortunately, mobile browsers don't allow you to change your "Trusted Sites" settings. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Four: Google Chrome (Desktop) Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/aa\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/aa\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Google Chrome.  It's the green, red, and yellow circle around a blue sphere icon.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/56\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/56\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-2-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  ⋮ .  This option is in the top-right corner of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/15\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-3-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-3-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/15\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-3-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-3-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Settings .  It's toward the bottom of the drop-down menu.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8e\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8e\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Scroll down and click  Show advanced settings .  You'll find this link at the bottom of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click  Content settings .  This option is below the "Privacy" heading.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Click  Manage exceptions  beneath the "Cookies" heading.  It's the first option in the "Content settings" menu.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/11\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-7-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/11\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-7-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Type in your website's URL.  You'll enter this information in the field beneath the "Hostname pattern" heading on the left side of the window.
 You can also  copy and paste the URL  into the field here. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bd\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-8-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-8-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bd\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-8-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-8-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 8 
 Make sure the "Behavior" settings says "Allow".  The "Behavior" setting is on the right side of the window.
 If the "Behavior" setting says "Block" or "Clear on exit", click the box and then click "Allow". 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-9-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-9-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-9-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-9-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 9 
 Click  Done .  It's in the bottom-right corner of the window. Doing so will save your settings for stored cookies and data on your Chrome browser.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-10-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-10-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-10-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-10-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 10 
 Repeat this process for other Chrome attributes.  As you scroll down, you'll see these headings:
 Pop-ups  - Sites on this list will allow pop-ups regardless of your other Chrome settings. 
 Location  - Sites on this list will be able to access your location. 
 Notifications  - Sites on this list will be able to send you notifications related to the site's content. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/22\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-11-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-11-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/22\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-11-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-11-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 11 
 Click  Done .  It's in the bottom-right corner of the "Content settings" window. Your website is now exempt from Chrome's usual content settings.
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Four: Safari (Desktop) Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/92\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-12.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-12.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/92\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-12.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-12.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Safari.  It's the blue icon with a compass.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ee\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-13-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-13-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ee\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-13-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-13-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Navigate to your website.  Do so by typing its address into the address bar at the top of the Safari window and then pressing  ⏎  Return .
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/84\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-14.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-14.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/84\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-14.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-14.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Two-finger click the URL.  It's the web address at the top of the Safari window. Doing so will prompt a drop-down menu.
 You can also hold down  ⌘  Cmd  and click using one finger. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/eb\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-15-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-15-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/eb\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-15-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-15-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click  Add Link to Bookmarks . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1c\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-16.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-16.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1c\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-16.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-16.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click the box below the "Add this page to" heading.  Doing so will prompt a drop-down menu with different bookmarks options.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f0\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-17.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-17.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f0\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-17.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-17.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Click  Top Sites .  It's near the top of the menu.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/36\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-18.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-18.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/36\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-18.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-18.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Click  Add .  Now your selected site is in Safari's "Top Sites" list, which means Safari will trust and allow different attributes of the site (such as images and pop-ups) that weren't previously allowed.
 You may have to restart your browser in order for these changes to take place.

 Method Three of Four: Internet Explorer Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-19.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-19.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-19.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-19.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Internet Explorer.  It's the blue "e" icon with a yellow circle.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-20.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-20.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-20.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-20.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  ⚙️ .  It's in the top-right corner of the Internet Explorer window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ee\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-21.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-21.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ee\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-21.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-21.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Internet options .  You'll see this option at the bottom of the drop-down menu; clicking it will open the "Internet Options" window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f4\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-22.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-22.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f4\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-22.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-22.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click  Privacy .  This tab is at the top of the "Internet Options" window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/89\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-23.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-23.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/89\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-23.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-23.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click  Sites .  It's near the top of the "Privacy" page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/85\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-24.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-24.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/85\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-24.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-24.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Type in your website's address.  You'll enter this information in the "Address of website" text field near the middle of the page.
 You can also  copy and paste the URL  into the field here. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-25.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-25.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-25.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-25.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Click  Allow .  It's on the right side of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4a\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-26.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-26.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4a\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-26.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-26.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 8 
 Click  OK .  Your selected website is now exempt from Internet Explorer's usual security settings.
 Advertisement 
 Method Four of Four: Firefox (Desktop) Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/17\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-27.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-27.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/17\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-27.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-27.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open Firefox.  Firefox's icon resembles a red-and-orange fox wrapped around a blue globe.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-28.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-28.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a4\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-28.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-28.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click  ☰ .  It's in the top-right corner of the Firefox window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5b\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-29.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-29.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5b\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-29.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-29.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click  Options .  This option is in the middle of the drop-down window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-30.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-30.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fc\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-30.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-30.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Click  Content .  It's on the far-left side of the Firefox window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-31.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-31.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-31.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-31.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Click  Exceptions .  This option is to the right of the "Pop-ups" heading near the middle of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-32.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-32.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-32.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-32.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Type in your website's URL.  You'll enter this information in the "Address of website" text field at the top of the window.
 You can also  copy and paste the URL  into the field here. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-33.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-33.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/46\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-33.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-33.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 7 
 Click  Allow .  It's below and to the right of the text field.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f7\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-34.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-34.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f7\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-34.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-34.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 8 
 Click  Save Changes .  It's in the bottom-right corner of the window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/00\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-35.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-35.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/00\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-35.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-35.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 9 
 Click  Security .  This tab is in the middle-left side of the window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-36.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-36.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/86\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-36.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-36.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 10 
 Click  Exceptions .  You'll see this option to the right of the "General" heading near the top of the page.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/52\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-37.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-37.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/52\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-37.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-37.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 11 
 Type in your website's URL.  You'll enter this information in the "Address of website" text field at the top of the window.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b5\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-38.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-38.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b5\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-38.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-38.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 12 
 Click  Allow .  It's below and to the right of the text field.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/23\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-39.jpg\/v4-460px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-39.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/2\/23\/Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-39.jpg\/v4-760px-Add-a-Website-to-Trusted-Sites-Step-39.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 13 
 Click  Save Changes .  It's in the bottom-right corner of the window. Your selected website is now exempt from general security measures and pop-up restrictions.
